languages.text: Из них стало ясно, что Строители-из-пламени изначально не заселяли пылающие миры. Их родиной была не планета, но звезда. Сложно даже вообразить, на что похожи были существа, спокойно жившие в кипящем океане далекого солнца. Однако их спокойной жизни однажды пришел конец — записи содержат жуткую легенду о некоем космическом ужасе, что явился и пожрал родную звезду Строителей. В страхе перед этим чудовищем они бежали прочь и больше не рисковали заселять звезды.

traits.locale_text: Из них стало ясно, что Строители-из-пламени изначально не заселяли пылающие миры. Их родиной была не планета, но звезда. Сложно даже вообразить, на что похожи были существа, спокойно жившие в кипящем океане далекого солнца. Однако их спокойной жизни однажды пришел конец — записи содержат жуткую легенду о некоем космическом ужасе, что явился и пожрал родную звезду Строителей. В страхе перед этим чудовищем, они бежали прочь и больше не рисковали заселять звезды.

languages.text: They revealed that the Builders From the Flame were not originally colonising the burning worlds. Their homeland was not a planet but a star. It is hard to imagine what the creatures that evolved in the burning ocean of a faraway sun may have looked like, but one day their peaceful existence came to an end. The records contain a chilling legend about some cosmic horror that arrived and devoured the sun that the Builders called home. Fearing the monster, they fled and no longer dared to settle on stars.

languages.text: 这些信息说明，筑火者并非起源于燃烧世界。它们原本的家园并不是行星，而是恒星。很难想象，在遥远恒星的火海之中进化出来的生物会是什么样子。某一天，它们的平静生活突然结束了。接下来的记录，讲述了某个令人不寒而栗的传说：某种来自宇宙的恐怖之物突然出现，吞噬了筑火者的家园。出于怪物的恐惧，筑火者们逃走了，再也不敢回到那颗行星上。
languages.original_text: They revealed that the Builders From the Flame were not originally colonising the burning worlds. Their homeland was not a planet but a star. It is hard to imagine what the creatures that evolved in the burning ocean of a faraway sun may have looked like, but one day their peaceful existence came to an end. The records contain a chilling legend about some cosmic horror that arrived and devoured the sun that the Builders called home. Fearing the monster, they fled and no longer dared to settle on stars.

traits.locale_text: 这些信息说明，筑火者并非起源于燃烧群界。它们原本的家园并不是行星，而是恒星。很难想象，在遥远恒星的火海之中进化出来的生物会是什么样子。某一天，它们的平静生活突然结束了。接下来的记录，讲述了某个令人不寒而栗的传说：某种来自宇宙的恐怖之物突然出现，吞噬了筑火者的家园。出于怪物的恐惧，筑火者们逃走了，再也不敢回到那颗行星上。

languages.text: 「炎のビルダー 」たちはもともとバーニングワールドをコロニーにしていたわけではないことが分かった。彼らの故郷は惑星ではなく星だった。はるか彼方の太陽の熱に焼きつけられた海で進化した生物がどのような姿をしていたのか想像するのは難しいが、ある日、彼らの平和な生活は終わりを告げた。その記録には、ビルダーたちが故郷と呼んでいた太陽にやって来て、それを食い尽くした、宇宙の恐怖についてのゾッとするような伝説が記されている。怪物を恐れた彼らは逃げ出し、もはや星に定住する気も失くしてしまった。
languages.original_text: They revealed that the Builders From the Flame were not originally colonising the burning worlds. Their homeland was not a planet but a star. It is hard to imagine what the creatures that evolved in the burning ocean of a faraway sun may have looked like, but one day their peaceful existence came to an end. The records contain a chilling legend about some cosmic horror that arrived and devoured the sun that the Builders called home. Fearing the monster, they fled and no longer dared to settle on stars.

traits.locale_text: 「炎のビルダー 」たちはもともとバーニングワールドをコロニーにしていたわけではないことが分かった。彼らの故郷は惑星ではなく星だった。はるか彼方の太陽の熱に焼きつけられた海で進化した生物がどのような姿をしていたのか想像するのは難しいが、ある日、彼らの平和な生活は終わりを告げた。その記録には、ビルダーたちが故郷と呼んでいた太陽にやって来て、それを食い尽くした、宇宙の恐怖についてのゾッとするような伝説が記されている。怪物を恐れた彼らは逃げ出し、もはや星に定住する気も失くしてしまった。

languages.text: Revelaron que los Constructores de la Llama no colonizaban originalmente los mundos ardientes. Su tierra natal no era un planeta, sino una estrella. Es difícil imaginar qué aspecto podían tener las criaturas que evolucionaron en el océano ardiente de un sol lejano, pero un día su pacífica existencia llegó a su fin. Los registros contienen una escalofriante leyenda sobre un horror cósmico que llegó y devoró el sol que los Constructores llamaban hogar. Temiendo al monstruo, huyeron y ya no se atrevieron a asentarse en las estrellas.
languages.original_text: They revealed that the Builders From the Flame were not originally colonising the burning worlds. Their homeland was not a planet but a star. It is hard to imagine what the creatures that evolved in the burning ocean of a faraway sun may have looked like, but one day their peaceful existence came to an end. The records contain a chilling legend about some cosmic horror that arrived and devoured the sun that the Builders called home. Fearing the monster, they fled and no longer dared to settle on stars.

traits.locale_text: Revelaron que los Constructores de la Llama no colonizaban originalmente los mundos {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardientes{/g}. Su tierra natal no era un planeta, sino una estrella. Es difícil imaginar qué aspecto podían tener las criaturas que evolucionaron en el océano ardiente de un sol lejano, pero un día su pacífica existencia llegó a su fin. Los registros contienen una escalofriante leyenda sobre un horror cósmico que llegó y devoró el sol que los Constructores llamaban hogar. Temiendo al monstruo, huyeron y ya no se atrevieron a asentarse en las estrellas.

languages.text: Daraus ging hervor, dass die Erbauer aus der Flamme ursprünglich nicht vorhatten, die brennenden Welten zu kolonisieren. Ihre Heimat war kein Planet gewesen, sondern ein Stern. Man kann sich schwer vorstellen, wie die Kreaturen, die sich im brennenden Ozean einer fernen Sonne entwickelt haben, ausgesehen haben müssen. Aber eines Tages fand ihre friedliche Existenz ein Ende. Die Aufzeichnungen enthalten eine unheimliche Legende von einem kosmischen Schrecken, der plötzlich aus dem Nichts auftauchte und die Sonne verschlang, auf der die Erbauer beheimatet waren. Aus Angst vor dem Monster flohen sie und wagten es nicht länger, sich auf Sternen niederzulassen.
languages.original_text: They revealed that the Builders From the Flame were not originally colonising the burning worlds. Their homeland was not a planet but a star. It is hard to imagine what the creatures that evolved in the burning ocean of a faraway sun may have looked like, but one day their peaceful existence came to an end. The records contain a chilling legend about some cosmic horror that arrived and devoured the sun that the Builders called home. Fearing the monster, they fled and no longer dared to settle on stars.

languages.text: Il en ressort que les Forge-Flammes n'ont pas toujours colonisé les mondes brûlants. En effet, leur terre natale n'était pas une planète, mais une étoile. S'il est difficile d'imaginer à quoi ressemblaient ces créatures nées de l'océan bouillant d'un soleil reculé, toujours est-il que cette race a disparu brutalement. Les archives évoquent une légende glaçante selon laquelle une horreur cosmique aurait débarqué un jour et dévoré leur soleil d'origine. Chassés par le monstre, ils auraient pris la fuite et n'auraient plus jamais osé s'installer sur des étoiles.
languages.original_text: They revealed that the Builders From the Flame were not originally colonising the burning worlds. Their homeland was not a planet but a star. It is hard to imagine what the creatures that evolved in the burning ocean of a faraway sun may have looked like, but one day their peaceful existence came to an end. The records contain a chilling legend about some cosmic horror that arrived and devoured the sun that the Builders called home. Fearing the monster, they fled and no longer dared to settle on stars.

languages.text: Kayıtlar, Alevlerden Çıkan Kurucuların ilk başta yanan dünyalarda koloni kurmadığını açığa çıkardı. Bu zenoların yurdu bir gezegen değil, bir yıldızmış. Uzak bir yıldızın alevler içindeki bir okyanusunda evrilen yaratıkların neye benzeyebileceğini hayal etmek zor olsa da, huzurlu yaşamları bir gün son bulmuş. Kayıtlarda, kozmik bir dehşetin gelip Kurucuların yurt bildiği güneşi yutması hakkında tüyler ürpertici bir efsane anlatılıyor. Canavarın korkusundan kaçıp bir daha da asla güneşlere yerleşmemişler.
languages.original_text: They revealed that the Builders From the Flame were not originally colonising the burning worlds. Their homeland was not a planet but a star. It is hard to imagine what the creatures that evolved in the burning ocean of a faraway sun may have looked like, but one day their peaceful existence came to an end. The records contain a chilling legend about some cosmic horror that arrived and devoured the sun that the Builders called home. Fearing the monster, they fled and no longer dared to settle on stars.
